item.title: Arch Linux installation guide
item.description: This is an installation guide based on the Youtube Series Arch My Way from unicks.eu Setup Partitions - Mountpoint Format Label p /boot fat32 EFI p / btrfs ROOT Subvolumes Btrfs ID 5 default sub /btrfs - Volume Mountpoint s @ / s @home /home s @snapshots /.
